snippet.title: Virtual Boy Longplay [13] Nesters Funky Bowling (3D) (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by MadMatty

Video has L/R switched to enable cross-eye viewing.  For viewing on a 3DTV or Nintendo 3DS, make use of the Swap R/L function to enable correct viewing.

Nester's Funky Bowling, developed by Saffire and published by Nintendo in 1996.

"A Striking Game with Red Hot Action Nester, the one-time bad boy of comic fame, brings you the funkiest game of bowling you'll ever experience in 3-D. Finally fans can throw a strike without putting on ill-fitting shoes! Hester, the unknown twin sister, makes her debut appearance. Watch out as the action picks up and the tensions build for these hot-headed bowlers. Their egos clash with outlandish gestures and funky expressions."

A short game/longplay.  The shortness probably makes it the best suited game for the Virtual Boy considering every game recommends you take a rest every 15 mins.

Aiming the ball and getting a strike is much more difficult then in Virtual Bowling.  There is no auto shot setup, and your aim needs to be dead on.

I've shown 3 runs.

00:00:00 First run, trying to show a few of nesters animations
00:04:01 Second run, I go for the 300 point perfect.
00:06:44 Challenge mode.  I should have spent more time with it and aimed for perfect but....oh well ;)
